Description: The following statement contains a magic number: foreach (XmlNode item in rootNode) {  	string currentPrice = item ["price"].InnerText;  	decimal price = decimal.Parse (currentPrice);  	if (price > 20) {  		item.RemoveAll ();  	}  }
The following statement contains a magic number: if (price > 20) {  	item.RemoveAll ();  }
